21-1072.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Economic Development and Finance Committee meeting held Tuesday, July 13, 2021.A motion was made by Chair Mungo, seconded by Member Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Mungo and AllenAbsent: 1 - RichardsonPage 1 of 4411 W.OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBER, 3:00 PMTUESDAY, OCTOBER 12, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE MINUTES2.
21-1072.transcript:
SPEAKER_02:  We have a quorum. 
SPEAKER_03:  Wonderful. First item, please. 
SPEAKER_02:  Item one is a recommendation to approve the minutes of the economic development and finance committee meeting held Tuesday July 13, 2021. 
SPEAKER_00:  Thank you. 
SPEAKER_03:  We need a second. 
SPEAKER_03:  Oh, you the second? 
SPEAKER_00:  Sorry. 
SPEAKER_03:  Perfect. Some technology glitches. No problem. 
SPEAKER_03:  We have a move in a second. Any public comment on the item? 
SPEAKER_01:  No public comment. 
SPEAKER_03:  We've cast your votes.

21-1073.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a report from Economic Development staff on 2nd Quarter 2021 Economic Indicators and Sales Tax Study Report for the City of Long Beach. Eric Romero, Business Development Officer, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Mungo spoke.Eric Romero, Business Development Officer, continued the PowerPoint presentation.Chair Mungo spoke.Eric Romero, Business Development Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and Eric Romero, Business Development Officer.Vice Chair Allen spoke.Eric Romero, Business Development Officer, spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and Eric Romero, Business Development Officer.A motion was made by Chair Mungo, seconded by Member Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Mungo and AllenAbsent: 1 - Richardson3.

21-1074.summary: Recommendation to conduct, receive and file a Study Session and receive input from Economic Development & Finance Committee Members and members of the public for the implementation of the Long Beach Recovery Act (LBRA) as approved by the City Council on March 16, 2021. Page 2 of 4411 W.OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBER, 3:00 PMTUESDAY, OCTOBER 12, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE MINUTESJohn Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Meredith Reynolds, Special Deputy City Manager for Recovery spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and Meredith Reynolds, Special Deputy City Manager for Recovery.A motion was made by Chair Mungo, seconded by Member Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Mungo and AllenAbsent: 1 - Richardson4.

The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Mungo and AllenAbsent: 1 - Richardson5.
